title: Deployment, Analytics & Monetization
overview: Ship your game, track its success, and understand how to sustain it.

sections.title: Deployment
sections.content: Web games are just static sites. Use CDNs for assets to ensure fast loading globally. Gzip/Brotli compression is huge for game assets.

sections.title: Monetization
sections.content:
- Ads (Interstitial/Rewarded)
- Brand Integrations
- In-App Purchases (requires backend validation)

questions.question: Why use a CDN?
options: It serves assets from servers close to the user
questions.correctAnswer: It serves assets from servers close to the user
questions.explanation: Low latency is critical for asset loading speed.

questions.question: What is a 'Rewarded Ad'?
options: An ad that pays the developer
An ad the user watches voluntarily for a game reward (e.g., extra life)
questions.correctAnswer: An ad the user watches voluntarily for a game reward (e.g., extra life)
